title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 195-1.1 - Purpose of part
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 195-1.1 - Purpose of part

State Regulations

To establish provisions governing authorized deductions
for the benefit of employees, for the recovery of overpayments due to clerical
or mathematical errors, and for repayment of advances. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
195-1.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
